name: Barrel Boy (Shroomius)
description:
Controls:
Arrow keys to move,  Z to Jump,  X to Pick up/Put down barrels, Shift to reset levels, and R to reset the console.

Description:

You play as barrel boy, an immortal, unfeeling creature, they go by boy, but have no distinguishable gendered characteristics. Trapped in this tan colored world, all they know is to collect the odd object leaking an indistinguishable material to proceed to the next area to repeat and continue the cycle. As stated before barrel boy cannot feel, they only operate in this loop of finishing puzzles involving putting barrels on top of each other and collecting this object. Barrel boy does not find this act pleasurable or painful, barrel boy's only purpose is to finish puzzles.

This was made for the retrograde 2 game jam.
